channel.title: ✯ Luntrix ✯ | Custom Clue Scrolls | Task System | Custom Loot system's
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/WfvrDQg.gif[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://luntrix.com][size=18pt]| Home [/size][/url][url=http://luntrix.com/forums][size=18pt]| Forums [/size][/url][url=http://luntrix.com/vote][size=18pt]| Vote [/size][/url][url=http://luntrix.com/client/luntrix.jar][size=18pt]| Play Now [/size][/url][url=http://luntrix.com/hiscores.php][size=18pt]| Hiscores |[/size][/url][/center]
[center][youtube]https://youtu.be/0L8BF28t3Is[/youtube][/center]
[center][size=18pt][u]Introduction[/u][/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Hello everyone. Luntrix is a relatively new server, that has been out for just over 2 weeks. We felt like before releasing our server we should fix up the majority of bugs that were present ingame. We feel that now, we are at the point that we are ready to start advertising our server and further develop our server.
Luntrix hosts a wide variety of activities for you to take part in. We have active staff members, dedicated owners and an active player base. We recently hit close to 40 players online at one time which was a big accomplishment for us but we want to expand our community and we hope that you decide to stop in and check out Luntrix.[/size][/center]
[center][img]https://i.gyazo.com/fe5733eb66c6882cca0d43ed76a7fa00.png[/img][/center]
[center][b][u][size=18pt]Server Features[/size][/u][/b][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Custom made quests. Task system with beneficial rewards. Custom made clue scroll system with over 100 clues to solve. Challenging experience rates. A custom skilling zone. Custom made PVP loot system similar to bounty hunter back in 2010. Competitive highscores. Full shooting star D&D with a useful rewards shop. Account profile saving on the log in screen. Automated Event system integrated into the website to show you what events are happening daily. Controlled economy. Loyalty point system with many good rewards. Gambling methods. Custom revenant system which generates a random spawn location within the wilderness. Full God Wars Dungeon Working Grand Exchange. Iron man mode. A starter boss to help new players find their feet and make some money in the process. Mystery boxes, skilling boxes and vote crates with good rewards. Over 15 bosses to try your luck at. Active minigames. Dedicated staff team, determined to keep the community happy. Active player base. Boss pets. Automatic donations. Working teleportation methods, including teletabs, tele scrolls, teleport crystal and the ectophial. Donator zone with tons of useful content for donators. Tiered slayer task difficulties. VPS hosted with very little lag. Working lootshare system.
We have much more to offer but we will let you find out that for yourselves.[/size][/center]
[center][b][u][size=18pt]Server Media[/size][/u][/b][/center] [center] [center][spoiler][img]https://i.gyazo.com/46ad77f19cd831ecb98901c79ec0e7f9.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/efad127fba4215ec95b53b3fe41dc723.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/61ce0f9126ba3241c72f788bef1c0a51.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/73777dac3674d4342d6646bcbc1394f1.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/35fd9ae49b8d42bfad609f9fdeb52f20.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/09cf2319ece4ccb21bb2b2205851ad10.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/7ab4604b0565b9631cbdc6bbed1941d3.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/c8adb9069044ca1188480d87eb2ffc82.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/d259fcbe1e93da04d05bd4eb5f8f4d24.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/0c9340e25a75fda3ffa3c3c2f8cd3d82.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/280262274b7fbfff8a28a24aaa06da3e.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/c082a78e7886fed0c9fe186c38525a12.png[/img][/spoiler][/center]
[/center]
[center][b][u][size=18pt]Server Update Logs[/size][/u][/b][/center] [center] [center][spoiler] [size=12pt]Yaks are now unaggressive so skillers won't be attacked if a shooting star lands in the pen. Ava's accumalator should now have a higher chance of saving your ammo. Clue scrolls should be working properly now. Clan chat ranks are now automatically assigned to staff members. The issue with bonds being redeemed, but not giving the correct rank has been fixed. The achievement task counter now automatically updates when you complete a task. Play time has now been added into the account information tab in the quest tab. The nevermind option on discount scrolls now functions correctly. The thieving cap at level 99 has been fixed, it was capping at 10 but now it caps at 50 like it was supposed to. Iron man accounts should now receive 2x xp from the vote crate instead of 1.5x. The fishing skill has been sped up due to some suggestions. ::thread now works ingame. The defender tasks in the task system should now work properly. The starter cash in dungeoneering has been changed from 45k, to 100k so you can gather more supplies before attempting the dungeon. Any one can teleport to the warriors guild now because of the warriors guild clue scroll. Referral items should go straight to the bank if your inventory is full. Metal dragons should no longer be aggressive. Useful for people doing a slayer task in the Brimhaven dungeon. Added a vote refresh command for when voting goes offline. Removed the 50 per day limit on stealing from thieving stalls due to player feedback. Added a combat reset to the ::kick command to help players that are experiencing the "Cannot log out while still in combat" bug. A permanent fix will be added soon. We have finalized the update system so updates should happen on the regular now. Discount scrolls have been removed from the game. You shouldn't be able to pick up more than one clue from now on. The "Complete TaS Quest" task has been fixed. The glitched spot in the graveyard minigame should no longer allow you to safe spot the zombies. We have added cash rewards when completing tasks. You will receive 100k for an easy task, 250k for a medium task, 500k for a hard task and 2.5m for an elite task. When completing 10 Medium, hard or elite tasks from the task system, you will receive a mystery box. Added a countdown into the events panel to let donators know when they can open the swag chest. Added a countdown into the events panel to let players know where the revenant is currently located. The "Add a log to the bonfire" task has been replaced with "InfuseAGranitePouch". The dungeoneering portal dialogue has been made clearer to understand when completing a dungeon. The draconic visage has been added to Mithril Dragons aswell as frost dragons. One of the dungeoneering npcs, the spinolyp, has had it's stats lowered. Steel titan's stats were buffed up. Wild dogs in Brimhaven dungeon should no longer attack you. Fishing has been sped up even more due to feedback. Refer a friend has been removed until further notice. The copper longtail hunter NPC has been removed. The chinchompa teleport now requires 60 hunter to use. Added a warning on the frost dragon teleport dialogue to warn players that they are in the wilderness. Reworded one of the clue scrolls due to players not knowing where to go. The slayer lamp now grants 50k exp instead of 10k due to player feedback. The berkserker necklace has been changed from 22k tokkuls, to 50k tokkuls in the tokkul shop. The Jad pet has been added into Jad as a rare drop (1:500) The tokhaar-kal has been added into Jad at a rate of 1:100. The squirrel ears should now equip in the correct slot. The ava's accumulator should now have an 80% chance of saving ammo. The donor zone has had all restrictions lifted. This means donators can use any of the content in the donor zone regardless of their donor rank. The refer a friend tasks have been removed, and replaced with 2 new tasks. "Summon a familiar" and "Complete 3 dungeons". The "Smith a Rune platebody" task has been fixed. Bill's task that required you to smith an adamant dagger has been fixed. Dungeoneering has received a slight buff to exp and tokens due to player feedback. Players should no longer see numbers appearing whilst doing certain actions ingame. The ::skill command has been added for convenience. Change password now works at the Luntrix manager Dragonfire shield, anti-dragon shield and antifire pots now works correctly Pest control portal hp interface now uses Hitpoints Changed websites reference system abit (owner tool) New toplist on vote page Hunter should be ok but let me know if not Void Pieces no longer sell to the shop When using dice outside of gambling zone it now correctly tells you were to teleport Added dialogue when teleporting to gambling area When clicking 'account lock' in player panel it now doesn't open slayer task We have changed the player death mechanics so you no longer lose items when dying outside of the wilderness. Added the :: Discord command which will take you to the discord server where you can talk with fellow players. Fixed one of the donation leprechaun's dialogue options. Nerfed Skilling boxes for firemaking and mining as they had a fairly high rate of giving players a skilling box. We have added a check inventory interface for staff members. Teletabs should now function properly when above level 20 wilderness. New ingame manager rank. Changed the maxed task to "Buy a max cape" New emote ( feelsbadman). God bows are now tradable and sellable. Penguin drops have been majorly improved. Fixed droplogs and npc tracker buttons. Fixed doublexp timer in player panel Fixed desert treasure randomly completeing itself suggestions are open again[/size] [/spoiler][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Thanks for reading, make sure to come check out Luntrix. We strive to bring you guys the best, and only the best, RSPS around.[/size][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/WfvrDQg.gif[/img][/center] [/center]

item.title: ✯ Luntrix ✯ | Custom Clue Scrolls | Task System | Custom Loot system's
item.dc:creator: @Luntrix Luntrix
item.description:
@Luntrix wrote:

[center]

WfvrDQg.gif720×90
[/center]

[center][size=18pt]| Home [/size][size=18pt]| Forums [/size][size=18pt]| Vote [/size][size=18pt]| Play Now [/size][size=18pt]| Hiscores |[/size][/center]

[center][youtube]https://youtu.be/0L8BF28t3Is[/youtube][/center]

[center][size=18pt]Introduction[/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]Hello everyone.
Luntrix is a relatively new server, that has been out for just over 2 weeks. We felt like before releasing our server we should fix up the majority of bugs that were present ingame. We feel that now, we are at the point that we are ready to start advertising our server and further develop our server.

Luntrix hosts a wide variety of activities for you to take part in. We have active staff members, dedicated owners and an active player base. We recently hit close to 40 players online at one time
which was a big accomplishment for us but we want to expand our community and we hope that you decide to stop in and check out Luntrix.[/size][/center]

[center][/center]

[center][size=18pt]Server Features[/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]Custom made quests.
Task system with beneficial rewards.
Custom made clue scroll system with over 100 clues to solve.
Challenging experience rates.
A custom skilling zone.
Custom made PVP loot system similar to bounty hunter back in 2010.
Competitive highscores.
Full shooting star D&D with a useful rewards shop.
Account profile saving on the log in screen.
Automated Event system integrated into the website to show you what events are happening daily.
Controlled economy.
Loyalty point system with many good rewards.
Gambling methods.
Custom revenant system which generates a random spawn location within the wilderness.
Full God Wars Dungeon
Working Grand Exchange.
Iron man mode.
A starter boss to help new players find their feet and make some money in the process.
Mystery boxes, skilling boxes and vote crates with good rewards.
Over 15 bosses to try your luck at.
Active minigames.
Dedicated staff team, determined to keep the community happy.
Active player base.
Boss pets.
Automatic donations.
Working teleportation methods, including teletabs, tele scrolls, teleport crystal and the ectophial.
Donator zone with tons of useful content for donators.
Tiered slayer task difficulties.
VPS hosted with very little lag.
Working lootshare system.

We have much more to offer but we will let you find out that for yourselves.[/size][/center]

[center][size=18pt]Server Media[/size][/center]
[center]
[center][spoiler]

46ad77f19cd831ecb98901c79ec0e7f9.png1237×698









0c9340e25a75fda3ffa3c3c2f8cd3d82.png1040×602


[/spoiler][/center]

[/center]

[center][size=18pt]Server Update Logs[/size][/center]
[center]
[center][spoiler]
[size=12pt]Yaks are now unaggressive so skillers won’t be attacked if a shooting star lands in the pen.
Ava’s accumalator should now have a higher chance of saving your ammo.
Clue scrolls should be working properly now.
Clan chat ranks are now automatically assigned to staff members.
The issue with bonds being redeemed, but not giving the correct rank has been fixed.
The achievement task counter now automatically updates when you complete a task.
Play time has now been added into the account information tab in the quest tab.
The nevermind option on discount scrolls now functions correctly.
The thieving cap at level 99 has been fixed, it was capping at 10 but now it caps at 50 like it was supposed to.
Iron man accounts should now receive 2x xp from the vote crate instead of 1.5x.
The fishing skill has been sped up due to some suggestions.
::thread now works ingame.
The defender tasks in the task system should now work properly.
The starter cash in dungeoneering has been changed from 45k, to 100k so you can gather more supplies before attempting the dungeon.
Any one can teleport to the warriors guild now because of the warriors guild clue scroll.
Referral items should go straight to the bank if your inventory is full.
Metal dragons should no longer be aggressive. Useful for people doing a slayer task in the Brimhaven dungeon.
Added a vote refresh command for when voting goes offline.
Removed the 50 per day limit on stealing from thieving stalls due to player feedback.
Added a combat reset to the ::kick command to help players that are experiencing the “Cannot log out while still in combat” bug. A permanent fix will be added soon.
We have finalized the update system so updates should happen on the regular now.
Discount scrolls have been removed from the game.
You shouldn’t be able to pick up more than one clue from now on.
The “Complete TaS Quest” task has been fixed.
The glitched spot in the graveyard minigame should no longer allow you to safe spot the zombies.
We have added cash rewards when completing tasks. You will receive 100k for an easy task, 250k for a medium task, 500k for a hard task and 2.5m for an elite task.
When completing 10 Medium, hard or elite tasks from the task system, you will receive a mystery box.
Added a countdown into the events panel to let donators know when they can open the swag chest.
Added a countdown into the events panel to let players know where the revenant is currently located.
The “Add a log to the bonfire” task has been replaced with “InfuseAGranitePouch”.
The dungeoneering portal dialogue has been made clearer to understand when completing a dungeon.
The draconic visage has been added to Mithril Dragons aswell as frost dragons.
One of the dungeoneering npcs, the spinolyp, has had it’s stats lowered.
Steel titan’s stats were buffed up.
Wild dogs in Brimhaven dungeon should no longer attack you.
Fishing has been sped up even more due to feedback.
Refer a friend has been removed until further notice.
The copper longtail hunter NPC has been removed.
The chinchompa teleport now requires 60 hunter to use.
Added a warning on the frost dragon teleport dialogue to warn players that they are in the wilderness.
Reworded one of the clue scrolls due to players not knowing where to go.
The slayer lamp now grants 50k exp instead of 10k due to player feedback.
The berkserker necklace has been changed from 22k tokkuls, to 50k tokkuls in the tokkul shop.
The Jad pet has been added into Jad as a rare drop (1:500)
The tokhaar-kal has been added into Jad at a rate of 1:100.
The squirrel ears should now equip in the correct slot.
The ava’s accumulator should now have an 80% chance of saving ammo.
The donor zone has had all restrictions lifted. This means donators can use any of the content in the donor zone regardless of their donor rank.
The refer a friend tasks have been removed, and replaced with 2 new tasks. “Summon a familiar” and “Complete 3 dungeons”.
The “Smith a Rune platebody” task has been fixed.
Bill’s task that required you to smith an adamant dagger has been fixed.
Dungeoneering has received a slight buff to exp and tokens due to player feedback.
Players should no longer see numbers appearing whilst doing certain actions ingame.
The ::skill command has been added for convenience.
Change password now works at the Luntrix manager
Dragonfire shield, anti-dragon shield and antifire pots now works correctly
Pest control portal hp interface now uses Hitpoints
Changed websites reference system abit (owner tool)
New toplist on vote page
Hunter should be ok but let me know if not
Void Pieces no longer sell to the shop
When using dice outside of gambling zone it now correctly tells you were to teleport
Added dialogue when teleporting to gambling area
When clicking ‘account lock’ in player panel it now doesn’t open slayer task
We have changed the player death mechanics so you no longer lose items when dying outside of the wilderness.
Added the :: Discord command which will take you to the discord server where you can talk with fellow players.
Fixed one of the donation leprechaun’s dialogue options.
Nerfed Skilling boxes for firemaking and mining as they had a fairly high rate of giving players a skilling box.
We have added a check inventory interface for staff members.
Teletabs should now function properly when above level 20 wilderness.
New ingame manager rank.
Changed the maxed task to “Buy a max cape”
New emote ( feelsbadman).
God bows are now tradable and sellable.
Penguin drops have been majorly improved.
Fixed droplogs and npc tracker buttons.
Fixed doublexp timer in player panel
Fixed desert treasure randomly completeing itself
suggestions are open again[/size]
[/spoiler][/center]

[center][size=18pt]Thanks for reading, make sure to come check out Luntrix. We strive to bring you guys the best, and only the best, RSPS around.[/size][/center]

[center]

WfvrDQg.gif720×90
[/center]
[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: ✯ Luntrix ✯ | Custom Clue Scrolls | Task System | Custom Loot system's
